document_data.name: ''Simbulmyn Bracers''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Simbulmyn bracers''''' were [[enchanted]] arm-guards worn by the [[Simbulmyn]] of [[Aglarond]].
document_data.Powers: The Simbulmyn served as the witch-queen of Aglarond's, the [[Simbul]]'s personal guard and spies, and as such, they needed powerful defensive items that steeled their minds and bodies. ''Simbulmyn bracers'' possessed a ''+2'' defensive enchantment, granted them indomitable will, and magical toughness, and improved their reaction in battle. Additionally, the wearer received resistance to [[negative energy]]. ''Simbulmyn bracers'' were designed to be used by [[human]]s, [[elves]], and [[half-elves]] exclusively.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, a pair of the ''Simbulmyn bracers'' fell into he hands of [[Mother Feodorra]], a charm and magic item peddler from the [[Rashemi]] city of [[Mulsantir]].
